welcome_message_body: Welcome to Barbacena, a charming city known for its historic architecture and picturesque landscapes. We hope you enjoy your time here and take the opportunity to explore all that this beautiful city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Moenda Café e Chocolateria
restaurants.description: Moenda Café e Chocolateria is a café located in Barbacena.
restaurants.address: R. Baronesa Maria Rosa, 287, Barbacena, MG, 36200-000

restaurants.name: Padaria Laguardia
restaurants.description: Padaria Laguardia is a bakery located in Barbacena.

restaurants.name: Restaurante Sal da Terra
restaurants.description: Restaurante Sal da Terra is a brazilian restaurant located in Barbacena.
restaurants.address: Rua José Bonifácio, 38 - Centro, Barbacena, MG

restaurants.name: Gino's i'l Candelabro
restaurants.description: Gino's i'l Candelabro is a italian restaurant located in Barbacena.

restaurants.name: Picanhas Grill
restaurants.description: Picanhas Grill is a churrascaria located in Barbacena.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sao Joao Del Rei Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional flights within Brazil.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free. Network name and password can be obtained at the information desk.
